summary: adding different itemized overlay icon for different points

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. 2. 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? I want to create different overlay icon for different point of interest at the same time. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? The latest version osmdroid 3.05 on android 2.2. Please provide any additional information below. I can create overlay icons with itemizediconoverlay properties, but this icon is default marker icon for every points. But I want to use different icon (such as sketch (image)of the object on that point) for each point. This is possible with google map. How can I do this with osmdroid? If it is possible I need an example. Thank you for your interest.
